---
title: "Tutorial of MAAS"
---

This manual helps to prepare multimodal data for Multimodel-based Analysis of scATAC-Seq (MAAS) input, including peak calling, CNV calling and SNV calling, MAAS running and functional enrichment analysis, which are organized step-by-step.
